txt.en: 'Would you like to increase a Virtue? This quest will rank up your currently earning virtue, so make sure you select an earning virtue in your Traits Panel.  You will also receive some Virtue XP items.\n\n'You're showing some nice patience, friend. And loyalty. I like that.'
'Here is some Virtue XP for you!'
Talk to Temerity to get Virtuous
Talk to Temerity to receive your virtue XP.
